document.full_text: tommy smith and reggie watts's 'radio play' is performed in almost complete darkness at performance space 122, placing a higher premium on what is heard, as opposed to what is seen.
document.title: theater review | 'radio play' : back to a time (the '80s) when digital was a mere dream
lines_and_colors: tommy smith and reggie watts's 'radio play' is performed in almost complete darkness at performance space 122, placing a higher premium on what is heard, as opposed to what is seen.
